p: In May 2018, two outbreaks of EKC occurred in two primary schools in Weixi Lisu Autonomous County, Diqing Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province. We conducted an outbreak investigation to identify the pathogen causing the two outbreaks; identified its genetic characteristics to analyse the intensity and characteristics of the outbreaks, the clinical manifestations of the patients, and the risk factors associated with acute conjunctivitis transmission within the schools; and provided infection control recommendations.
